lst.name: sentence
lst.str: An aide to USDA undersecretary Daniel Amstutz, who is reported to be strongly opposed to EEP wheat to the Soviets, said that the Shultz comments "are consistent with what he (Shultz) has taught for years as an economist," but said they don't necessarily relate to the Soviet Union.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Kansas City hard wheat futures rose another 2-1/4 cents by midday at 2.88-1/4 dlrs per bushel, while CBT March wheat was up 1-1/2 cents at 2.92-1/2 dlrs.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a meeting with exporters this week, Secretary of Agriculture Richard Lyng refused to comment on their request that the administration offer subsidized wheat to Moscow, the officials said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: An aide to USDA undersecretary Daniel Amstutz, who is reported to be strongly opposed to EEP wheat to the Soviets, said that the Shultz comments "are consistent with what he (Shultz) has taught for years as an economist," but said they don't necessarily relate to the Soviet Union.

lst.str: Kansas City hard wheat futures rose another 2-1/4 cents by midday at 2.88-1/4 dlrs per bushel, while CBT March wheat was up 1-1/2 cents at 2.92-1/2 dlrs.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a meeting with exporters this week, Secretary of Agriculture Richard Lyng refused to comment on their request that the administration offer subsidized wheat to Moscow, the officials said.
